title: New York Underground Collection - Richard Kern / DVDR
description:
New York Underground Collection - Richard Kern - 1984-1993

The fantastic shorts by Richard Kern. Upped on request. Uncompressed DVD9 

Thirteen shorts directed by Richard Kern, master of the Cinema of Transgression, shot in Super 8, over a ten-year period (1984-1993). From The Right Side of My Brain to Fingered, from The Bitches to My Nightmare, from Submit to Me Now to The Evil Cameraman, galleries of disturbing excursions into sado-masochism. Also included is The Manhattan Love Suicides (1985), a series of suicides committed out of love by an array of freak characters. It includes the story of a fan who pursues the great artist and as the young man writhes on the floor, inspires the idea for a new film (Stray Dogs); and a woman who disfigures her face to resemble her deformed lover (I Hate You Now). 

Contains the following:

The Right Side Of My Brain
# 1984, USA, 23 minutes, super 8, black and white
# written by: Lydia Lunch and Richard Kern
# produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# cast: Lydia Lunch, Clint Ruin and Henry Rollins
# Plot:

About the Sexual Misadventures of a Sexually Insane Girl...


The Manhattan Love Suicides (4 episodes)
# - Stray Dogs
# - Woman at the Wheel
# - Thrust in Me
# - I Hate You Now
# 1985, USA, 36 minutes, super 8, black and white
# written, produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# music: J.G Thirlwell and Dream Syndicate
# cast: David Wojnarowicz, Bill Rice, Nick Zedd
# Plot:

Stray Dogs, about artist and persistent fan.
Woman at the Wheel, about woman fighting with men in order to drive her own car.
Thrust in Me, about necrophilia, suicide, and bathtubs.
I Hate You Now, about deformed guy and his girlfriend.


Submit to Me
# 1985, USA, 10 minutes, super 8, colour
# written, produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# music: Butthole Surfers
# Plot:

Oddballs dancing, leering at camera, guy shaving a nontraditional part of his body and man ripping his own throat out, woman stabbing herself to death.


You Killed Me First
# 1985, USA, 11 minutes, super 8, colour
# written, produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# cast: Karen Finley, David Wojnarowicz, Lung Leg
# Plot:

Typical story of anarchist kid, Elizabeth, rebelling against family&#039;s consumerist and religious values. Ends when the disturbed kid guns her family down.


The Evil Cameraman
# 1986, 1990, USA, 11 minutes, super 8, colour
# written, produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# music: FÃƒâ€¦?tus Corp
# cast: Jap Anne, Ice Queen, Richard Kern, Little Linda, Jackie O
# Plot:

Another misogynistic piece involving women of all races caught up in rather violent situations.


Fingered
# 1986, USA, 23 minutes, super 8, black and white
# written by: Lydia Lunch and Richard Kern
# produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# music: Lydia Lunch e J.G. Thirlwell
# cast: Lydia Lunch, Lung Leg, Marty Nations
# Plot:

A phone sex operator/prostitute gets together with a guy she&#039;s been on the phone with. After a semi-hardcore sex scene, the violence begins. The man cuts someone&#039;s throat for looking at Lydia&#039;s character, then they go for a drive. The two abduct a hitch hiker and rape her in a junkyard.


Submit to Me Now
# 1987, USA, 17 minutes, super 8, colour
# written, produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# music: Thurston Moore, J. G. Thirlwell, Bewitched and Black Snakes
# cast: Nick Zedd, Cassandra Stark, Lydia Lunch, Audrey Rose, Richard Kern, Clint Ruin, Lung Leg, Marta Hoskins, Pete Shore, Jack Natz, Cruella De Villa

Rehash of Submit to Me. Oddballs dancing, leering at camera, guy shaving a nontraditional part of his body and man ripping his own throat out, woman stabbing herself to death.


X is Y
# 1990, USA, 4 minutes, super 8, colour
# written, produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# music: Cop Shoot Cop
# cast: Tomoya, Jackie O, Linda Serby, Cassandra Stark, Cristina
# Plot:

People playing with firearms with telephone sound effects in the background.


Horoscope
# 1991, USA, 5 minutes, super 8, black & white and colour
# written, produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# music: Budenholzer
# cast: Holly Adams, Bob Drywall, Squeak Wilentz
# Plot:

Woman dreams of dancing with men after reading horoscope and watching "Studs."


The Bitches
# 1992, USA, 9 minutes, super8, black and white
# written, produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# music: Jim Coleman
# cast: Linda Serbu, Annabelle Davies, Charles Wing



Death Valley ÃƒÂ¢??69
# 1986, USA, 6 minutes, super 8, colour
# Written and produced by: Sonic Youth and Richard Kern
# directed by: Richard Kern
# cast: Sonic Youth
# Music Video Sonic Youth
# Plot:

Gory Sonic Youth music video with murdered family and cruise missile imagery.


The Sewing Circle
# 1992, USA, 7 minutes, super 8, colour
# written, produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# cast: Kembra Phfaler, Lisa Resurrection and Carrie



My Nightmare
# 1993, USA, 5 minutes, super 8, colour
# written, produced and directed by: Richard Kern
# cast: Susan McNamara, Richard Kern
